page.title: 03Bentfield Bury Farm
page.content: Bentfield Bury Farm now includes Bentfield Green Farm, Hole Farm and Bentfield Mill House. On the farm they have seven workers, Mr. Brett the manager, Mr.Salmon the under_manager, three tractor drivers, one tractor driver/shepherd and one pigman. {** WARMANS FARM}.Mr Warmans owns Warmans farm.He farms 115 acres of wheat barley and oats.He uses 1 tractor/plough,harrow,roller,fertilize r spreader,spraying machine,combine and straw chopper.He works 9 hours a day,and employs 1 casual worker. {**PARSONAGE FARM}.Mr Morton owns Parsonage Farm.He farms 230 acres of wheat,barley and rapeseed.His rotational system is planned 4 years ahead.He only uses contractors.He works 10 hours a day.Mr Morton plants trees.
